com.mapgroup.classificator.tree

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.tree.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeafNode, SplitNode

    public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a generic node in a decision tree
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int beginExampleIndex
      Index of the decision tree's array which represents the first example of the current node
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> classValueAbsoluteFrequency
      This controls the absolute frequency values for each class value.
      private int endExampleIndex
      Index of the decision tree's array which represents the last example of the current node
      protected float entropy
      Value of the calculate entropy, respect to the current node, in the training subset of the node

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Node(Data trainingSet, int beginExampleIndex, int endExampleIndex)
      Supports the primitive attributes of class, instantiates and populates the modeled structure classValueAbsoluteFrequency object and uses this to calculate the entropy with respect to the attribute class in the subset of training covered by the node

      Returns the entropy value
      abstract int getNumberOfChildren()
      Returns number of children's node

      • Node

        Node(Data trainingSet,
    int beginExampleIndex,
    int endExampleIndex)
        Supports the primitive attributes of class, instantiates and populates the modeled structure classValueAbsoluteFrequency object and uses this to calculate the entropy with respect to the attribute class in the subset of training covered by the node
        Parameters:
        trainingSet - current training set
        beginExampleIndex - index that represents the first extreme of the training subset
        endExampleIndex - index that represents the last extreme of the training subset
